bibl.title: Letter from Margaret H. Lower to Emilie Lawrence Reed, December 11, 1930

div1.p: Lower informs Emilie Lawrence Reed that the Walter Reed Army Medical Center Chapel has been completed.

div1.head: Letter from Margaret H. Lower to Emilie Lawrence Reed, December 11, 1930

December 11, 1930.
Mrs. Walter Reed,
The Burlington Hotel,
Washington, D. C.
Dear Mrs. Reed:
div1.p:
I am so sorry not to have seen you. I do
hope you saw the Chapel. It is so lovely and has gone
beyond our wildest dreams. We hope to dedicate it the 11th.
of next May. I am so glad the silver is finished, I'll drop
in some day to see it.
div1.closer:
Most sincerely, (Miss) MARGARET H. LOWER,
VICE CHAIRMAN. MHL/H
